description.narrative: The International HIV/AIDS Alliance (IHAA) is an alliance partner within the Beat the AIDS Epidemic partnership. This strategic partnership aims to beat the AIDS epidemic in countries that are most affected by HIV. In these countries we will strengthen local civil society organisations to advocate for equal access to HIV and sexual and reproductive health-related services; equal sexual and reproductive health and rights for those most affected by HIV; and decriminalisation, particularly for key populations. We will build new coalitions and bring local evidence to global policy development level.
